attributes.action: Repatriate all children of senior Zanu PF officials being educated and housed in Britain, irrespective of if they are fee-paying or State Educated
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We, the undersigned, ask Gordon Brown to repatriate all children of Zimbabwean Zanu PF officials who are being educated and housed in Britain,  irrespective of if they are fee-paying or State Educated, in order to further protest our disgust at the Mugabe regime. We ask that he makes a recommendation to the EU to do the same.

These children of the ruling elite may well help bring about positive change when they get back to Zimbabwe if they live as other Zimbabweans, and may demand their parents level the playing field for all their peers,and the nation as a whole, given their experience of a better way of life in the UK.
